title: Machine Learning Competitions
description: Achievements in Kaggle competitions and machine learning challenges

competitions.title: SIIM-ACR Pneumothorax Segmentation
competitions.description: Medical image segmentation challenge for detecting pneumothorax in chest X-rays
competitions.achievement: Won as a solo participant, invited to speak at C-MIMI conference

competitions.title: Home Credit Default Risk
competitions.description: Achieved 18th place in Home Credit's machine learning competition focused on predicting loan default risk. This challenge involved working with complex tabular data including demographic information, credit history, and behavioral patterns to assess creditworthiness. The competition aimed to help Home Credit expand financial inclusion by providing loans to underserved populations while maintaining responsible lending practices.
competitions.impact: The developed models help financial institutions make more accurate lending decisions, potentially expanding access to credit for underbanked populations while minimizing default risk.

competitions.title: Avito Demand Prediction Challenge
competitions.description: Secured 12th place in Avito's demand prediction challenge, which required predicting the popularity of online advertisements. This complex multimodal problem involved analyzing text descriptions, images, and categorical features to forecast how much interest an ad would generate. The challenge combined natural language processing, computer vision, and traditional machine learning techniques to solve a real-world e-commerce problem.
competitions.impact: The solution helps optimize ad placement and pricing strategies for online marketplaces, improving user experience and business outcomes.

competitions.title: Quick, Draw! Doodle Recognition Challenge
competitions.description: Google Research featured prediction competition focused on building a better classifier for the Quick, Draw! dataset. The task was to improve pattern recognition solutions for handwriting recognition with robust applications in OCR (Optical Character Recognition), ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition) & NLP (Natural Language Processing).
competitions.achievement: Advanced pattern recognition techniques for doodle classification

competitions.title: Microsoft Malware Prediction
competitions.description: Microsoft challenged the data science community to develop techniques to predict if a machine will soon be hit with malware. With more than one billion enterprise and consumer customers, Microsoft provided an unprecedented malware dataset to encourage open-source progress on effective techniques for predicting malware occurrences before damage happens.
competitions.achievement: Advanced cybersecurity prediction models for malware detection

competitions.title: TalkingData AdTracking Fraud Detection Challenge
competitions.description: TalkingData, China's largest independent big data service platform, challenged participants to build an algorithm that predicts whether a user will download an app after clicking a mobile app ad. They handle 3 billion clicks per day, of which 90% are potentially fraudulent. The dataset covered approximately 200 million clicks over 4 days.
competitions.achievement: Advanced fraud detection algorithms for mobile advertising

competitions.title: Freesound Audio Tagging 2019
competitions.description: Achieved 21st place in the Freesound Audio Tagging challenge, focusing on automatic audio classification and tagging. This competition required developing models to identify and classify various sounds and audio events from the Freesound database. The challenge involved working with audio signal processing, spectrograms, and deep learning techniques specialized for audio data.
competitions.impact: Contributes to advancing automatic audio content analysis, with applications in music recommendation, sound effect libraries, and audio accessibility tools.

competitions.title: RSNA Intracranial Hemorrhage Detection
competitions.description: Intracranial hemorrhage, bleeding that occurs inside the cranium, is a serious health problem requiring rapid and often intensive medical treatment. In this competition, hosted by the Radiological Society of North America (RSNA), participants were challenged to build an algorithm to detect acute intracranial hemorrhage and its subtypes from head CT scans, aiming to help reduce the time to diagnosis.
competitions.impact: Advanced automated diagnosis of critical brain conditions, potentially saving lives through faster medical intervention.

competitions.title: iMaterialist (Fashion) 2019 at FGVC6
competitions.description: The iMaterialist (Fashion) 2019 competition, part of the Fine-Grained Visual Categorization Workshop (FGVC6) at CVPR, challenged participants to develop algorithms for accurate segmentation and attribute labeling of fashion images. This competition represented an important step toward real-world applications in fashion AI, requiring models to not only identify clothing items but also understand their detailed attributes and precise pixel-level segmentation.
competitions.impact: Contributed to advancing fashion AI technology for e-commerce and retail applications.

competitions.title: Shopee - Price Match Guarantee
competitions.description: Matching products across different listings using images and text
competitions.achievement: Multi-modal learning combining vision and NLP

competitions.title: Cassava Leaf Disease Classification
competitions.description: Identifying diseases in cassava plants from leaf images
competitions.achievement: Agricultural AI for crop disease detection

competitions.title: ODS Community Recognition
competitions.description: Received recognition from the Open Data Science (ODS) community for outstanding progress and contributions in machine learning competitions. ODS is one of the largest data science communities, bringing together professionals and enthusiasts from around the world. This award recognizes consistent high performance across multiple competitions and active contribution to the ML community through knowledge sharing and mentorship.
competitions.impact: Demonstrates commitment to advancing the broader data science community through competition excellence and knowledge sharing.
